situation: Raising grandson and he is being very difficult and not listening.  I also have a lot of medical iss

final_result.label: normal
final_result.response: It's great to hear that he enjoys your time together, even if he gets a bit restless. Maybe you could consider some indoor activities that are low-impact but still fun? For example, you could try crafting together, playing board games, or even having a movie day with some of his favorite films. What do you think he would enjoy the most?
